channel.title: McLighting on Debashish Sahu
channel.description: Recent content in McLighting on Debashish Sahu

item.title: MeshyMcLighting: NeoPixels Lighting Solution Using Mesh Network
item.description: Wouldn’t be cool for many McLighting (RGB LED lighting using NeoPixels) to talk to each other and synchronize? Here is my naive attempt at this, which requires McLighting to be served as stand-alone web-client. MeshyMcLighting What is this? Wouldn’t be cool for many McLighting to talk to each other and synchronize? Here is my naive attempt at this, which requires McLighting to be served as stand-alone webclient.
